=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 8, col = 2)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 8, col = 2)

Given the current position of the avatar at (row = 8, col = 2) and the last position being the same, it indicates that the avatar did not move during the last action attempt. As per the game mechanics, I should rotate the avatar towards my chosen direction, then need to act again to move if necessary.

To make progress, I need to determine an available action. The most meaningful action that follows the strategy of targeting passengers is to try moving up to collect the passenger at position (row = 4, col = 3).

Hence, I will first attempt to rotate the avatar to face up and then move up to attempt to get closer to the passenger.

``` Action: 4 ``` 

This action is expected to help move up towards the passenger, aligning with the strategy of prioritizing passenger collection.
